official_title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination by creditors against members of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Amends the Consumer Credit Protection Act (title VII of which is the Equal Credit Opportunity Act) to prohibit discrimination by creditors on the basis of the grade of an applicant who is a member of the armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination by creditors against members of the Armed Forces.
